title: Rishi Sunak – 2022 Statement on Wanting to Become Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Rishi Sunak, the former Chancellor of the Exchequer, on 8 July 2022.
content:
I got into politics because I want everyone in this country to have the opportunity to be able to give their children a better future.
